visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart comparing the estimated production of corn and wheat for the year 2020 across different countries. The chart should have a title 'Corn vs Wheat Estimated Production for 2020', with the subtitle providing a source link. The x-axis should represent countries with categories 'USA', 'China', 'Brazil', 'EU', 'India', and 'Russia', and the y-axis should represent production in '1000 metric tons (MT)'. The chart should include two series, one for corn and one for wheat, with specific colors for each series. Additionally, the chart should have a tooltip displaying the production value with the suffix ' (1000 MT)'. The chart should also have a crosshair for better readability and specific styling for axes and labels.

title.text: Corn vs Wheat Estimated Production for 2020

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart that visualizes the estimated production of corn and wheat for the year 2020 across six countries: USA, China, Brazil, EU, India, and Russia. The chart is titled 'Corn vs Wheat Estimated Production for 2020' and includes a subtitle with a link to the source data. The x-axis is categorized by country names, and the y-axis represents production in '1000 metric tons (MT)'. The chart includes two data series, one for corn and one for wheat, each with specific colors. The tooltip displays the production value with the suffix ' (1000 MT)'. Additionally, the chart features a crosshair for enhanced readability and basic styling for axes and labels.
